name: Salt
description: Basic mineral seasoning - enhances flavor and preserves food

name: Black Pepper
description: Pungent spice from peppercorn berries - adds heat and complexity

name: Olive Oil
description: Mediterranean oil from olives - used for cooking, dressing, marinades

name: Soy Sauce
description: Fermented soybean condiment - adds umami and saltiness

name: Vinegar
description: Acidic liquid - balances flavors and tenderizes proteins

name: Sugar
description: Sweet crystalline carbohydrate - sweetens and balances flavors

name: Garlic Powder
description: Dried ground garlic - convenient alternative to fresh with longer shelf life

name: Paprika
description: Ground red pepper spice - adds color and mild sweet pepper flavor

name: Chili Powder
description: Blend of ground chilies and spices - adds heat and depth to dishes

name: Oregano
description: Mediterranean herb - aromatic and slightly bitter flavor profile
